Subject: Neo Beast Wars
Date: Fri, 16 Jun 2000 10:21:39 MDT
Mime-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; format=flowed
From: "Trans formers" <logomorph@...>

::Ursa Major::

*She walked along untill she came to the bridge.  She looked around the 
room.  She saw the consoles and holo-imageprojectors.  She saw the image of 
the battle at the Predacon base.  Her spark fell to her knees.  She wanted 
to help.  But she wan't sure what would be the best way to help.  She walked 
over to the projector and turned on the sound to hear what was happening.  
She heard the shots and thumping of metal on metal. She heard the crashing 
of swords and firing of weapons.  She wanted to help.  She couldn't just sit 
there and watch as her new friends died and she not do anything to help.  
She ran off the bridge and to an entrance way.  She ran out and ran through 
the forest.*

"I hope I make it in time."

*She changed into beast mode and continued to run to the Predacon base.*
